title: Loosing sidebar column on pc shutdown.
content:
Hi there, Mystery bug. Each time I shut pc down (not complete power down) I loose the sidebar column. I checked View/sidebar/bookmarks has a tick, and all appears correct. I reloaded FF and issue still present. Whats the hoedown on this ?

regards rj
creator: lab.schloss

title: Background tabs triggering master password popups
content:
I have a lot of tabs open, and I don't know which are responsible for the popups. Previously, I'd get 2-3 unexpected popups per day (that were not triggered by navigation in visible tabs), but since yesterday, every ~10min I'm getting 2 popups right after each other.

How do I find out what tab is triggering them?

Besides the annoyance, I find it worrying that firefox apparently "intends" to input login details into background tabs - if I had entered my master password previously, I wouldn't even notice that the password store had been accessed.

It would be really nice if the master password popup had a button to view the triggering tab (and perhaps highlight the fields that would have been filled after unlocking), but until that happens, I really need some way to locate the problematic tab(s)...

title: Mozilla signbout on Firefox close
content: I run Firefox on two windows machines, with identical settings and extensions - I regularly sync across them, and have all my passwords saved to a local file, just in case. Recently, one machine (the only one with Win11) has begun disconnecting me from Mozilla every time I close Firefox, and wiping the saved passwords. I have to sign in to Mozilla and import all the passwords every time i reopen Firefox. I have tried all the refresh, reinstall options and nothing seems to fix it. Any ideas what's going on and how to fix?
creator: little.fish

title: Finder download pop up window in another language
content: Ive already changed my firefox language in settings, restarted firefox, restarted my mac. All to no avail. The finderr download dialog box is still in spanish. The rest of firefox is in english, my computer is in english and its set as a main language. I simply dont understand. Ive asked chatgpt and the answer is the same "change firefox language settings"... but my settings are in english already

TypeError: linkMap is undefined     Links_onLinkChanged resource://gre/modules/NewTabUtils.sys.mjs:2003     PlacesProvider__callObservers resource://gre/modules/NewTabUtils.sys.mjs:697     handlePlacesEvents resource://gre/modules/NewTabUtils.sys.mjs:671 NewTabUtils.sys.mjs:699:19 SearchTelemetry: Expected to report URI for https://www.google.com/search?client=firefox-b-1-d&q=tokina+11-18 with ads but couldn't find the informationbold text

title: Mozzila Fire Fox se desconfigura
content:
Boa noite!

Utilizo o Windows 11 toda vez que ligo o notebook o fire fox ele desconfigura e aparece como se estivesse acabado de ser instalado, onde a personalização do tema, e da aparência se desconfigura e perde toda as configurações toda vez que o notebook é ligado ou reenciado quando ocorre uma atualização no Windows.

Gostaria de saber como resolver esse caso! Sem ter que re-configurar tudo de novo, pois já tem um perfil, já exclui e criei outro perfil e o problema volta!
creator: oide.marcelo
